name: Modern Leather Sofa
description: A sleek and comfortable sofa, perfect for modern living rooms. Upholstered in genuine leather with a sturdy wooden frame.

name: Minimalist Oak Desk
description: Work in style with this minimalist desk made from solid oak. Features clean lines and a spacious surface.

name: Ergonomic Office Chair
description: Stay comfortable during long work hours with this ergonomic chair, featuring adjustable lumbar support and armrests.

name: Geometric Wood Bookshelf
description: A unique geometric bookshelf made from light natural wood, perfect for organizing and displaying your favorite books and decorative items.

name: Velvet Accent Chair
description: Add a pop of color and luxury to any room with this plush velvet accent chair. Available in multiple vibrant colors.

name: Glass-Top Coffee Table
description: A stylish coffee table featuring a tempered glass top and an industrial black metal frame.

name: Scandinavian Dining Table
description: A clean and functional dining table inspired by Scandinavian design, featuring light oak wood and angled legs.

name: Contemporary Floor Lamp
description: Illuminate your space with this sleek floor lamp featuring a matte black finish and a warm LED bulb.

name: Modern Minimal Wall Clock
description: A chic, modern wall clock with a clean minimal design, great for kitchens or living rooms.

name: Handwoven Jute Area Rug
description: A durable and eco-friendly area rug, handwoven from 100% natural jute. Adds warmth and texture to any floor.

name: Two-Drawer Walnut Nightstand
description: A compact nightstand made from walnut wood, with two spacious drawers and a streamlined silhouette.

name: Mid-Century Armchair
description: Relax in style with this mid-century modern armchair, featuring tapered legs and a soft fabric seat.
